pageTitle: OnOne Software Perfect Photo Suite 6.1 Review
textBeforeTable: System requirements The Perfect Photo Suite 6.1 is available from the OnOne Software website for $299.95.   OVERALL   VALUE FOR MONEY   PERFORMANCE   FEATURES Cons Pros Lots of repetition within the package May run sluggishly on older/slower computers, even if they meet the minimum requirements Most effects applied in a couple of clicks Can be used standalone, or integrated into other software's Easy to get to grips with Plenty of effects and features to choose from The onOne Software Perfect Photo Suite 6.1 is easy to use and has plenty of effects and features to choose from. The sheer range of effects and options presented can be mind-boggling, especially as there is a fair amount of duplication within the software. Given time to familiarise yourself with your favourite settings, this package becomes very easy to use, producing excellent results
